summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the issuance and sale of, funding and refunding water utility revenue bonds in the sum of $2,000,000 for the purpose of funding, refunding, paying and retiring on December 1, 1927, a like amount of "Seattle Water Extension Bonds, 1920, Series No. WZ-1" issued pursuant to Ordinance No. 37520 (as amended), and creating and establishing a special fund to pay the principal and interest of said funding and refunding bonds.
